nl.esciencecenter.octopus

Interface Octopus


  • public interface Octopus
    Main Octopus interface. This interface provides an access point to all packages of Octopus and several utility functions.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jason Maassen

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Credentials credentials()
      Retrieve the Credentials package interface.
      Files files()
      Retrieve the Files interface.
      AdaptorStatus getAdaptorStatus(String adaptorName)
      Returns information about the specified adaptor.
      AdaptorStatus[] getAdaptorStatuses()
      Returns information on all adaptors available to this Octopus.
      Map<String,String> getProperties()
      Returns the properties that where used to create this Octopus.
      Jobs jobs()
      Retrieve the Jobs interface.

    • Method Detail

      • files

        Files files()
        Retrieve the Files interface.
        Returns:
        a reference to the Files interface.

      • jobs

        Jobs jobs()
        Retrieve the Jobs interface.
        Returns:
        a reference to the Files package interface.

      • credentials

        Credentials credentials()
        Retrieve the Credentials package interface.
        Returns:
        a reference to the Credentials package interface.

      • getProperties

        Map<String,String> getProperties()
        Returns the properties that where used to create this Octopus.
        Returns:
        the properties used to create this Octopus.

      • getAdaptorStatus

        AdaptorStatus getAdaptorStatus(String adaptorName)
                               throws OctopusException
        Returns information about the specified adaptor.
        Parameters:
        adaptorName - the adaptor for which to return the information.
        Returns:
        an AdaptorInfo containing information about the specified adaptor.
        Throws:
        OctopusException - if the adaptor does not exist, or no information could be retrieved.

      • getAdaptorStatuses

        AdaptorStatus[] getAdaptorStatuses()
        Returns information on all adaptors available to this Octopus.
        Returns:
        information on all adaptors.
